General.Name: Alternative Income REIT PLC
General.Description: Alternative Income REIT plc aims to generate a sustainable, secure and attractive income return for shareholders from a diversified portfolio of UK property investments, predominately in alternative and specialist sectors. The majority of the assets in the Group's portfolio are let on long leases which contain inflation linked rent review provisions. The Company's investment adviser is M7 Real Estate Limited (M7). M7 is a leading specialist in the pan-European, regional, multi-tenanted real estate market. The company has 225 employees in 14 countries and territories. The team manages over 590 properties with a value of circa "5.9 billion.
General.Address: 1 King William Street, London, United Kingdom, EC4N 7AF

1.Name: Mr. Robert  Wilkinson
